title: Submitting To Authority | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Submitting To Authority | Joel Osteen
description:
If we want to experience God’s best, we have to learn to submit to the authority in our lives. When you humble yourself and do the right thing even when it's difficult, God will take care of promoting you. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
